description: This super groovy VW bus is a product of the passionate and entrepreneurial spirit of Mary & Kayla, two teens with a dream to serve the people of Denver a taste of world peace with every cone of delicious ice cream. Each tasty sundae concoction from Peaceful Creations is named after icons who famously supported the same cause, such as The Lennon, The Malala, The Gandhi, The Dalai Lama, the MLK Jr., and The Nelson Mandela. You can even customize your own legendary creation with their variety of yummy toppings. Come on up to this whimsical bus to indulge your desire for flavorful frozen fun, all the while being inspired to help the world become a better one, thanks to Peaceful Creations.
name: Peaceful Creations
